risk_register.description: Delay in server provisioning or technical task completion due to Technical Lead's limited availability (50% allocation).
risk_register.response_strategy_description: Confirm project task priorities with Tech Lead and their manager; identify critical path tasks requiring Tech Lead input early; explore delegation options.

risk_register.description: Project cost exceeds the fixed $5,000 budget due to unforeseen technical issues, scope changes, or resource time.
risk_register.response_strategy_description: Implement strict change control; track expenses meticulously against budget; report budget status regularly to Project Sponsor; identify potential cost-saving measures proactively.

risk_register.description: The provided 'EmpDir' application contains significant bugs requiring unplanned fixes, delaying deployment.
risk_register.response_strategy_description: Allocate sufficient time for thorough testing early in the schedule; ensure Technical Lead performs code review/deployment dry-run if possible; document all bugs found.

risk_register.description: Inability to resolve application-specific bugs or deployment issues quickly due to limited availability and minimal documentation from the original development team.
risk_register.response_strategy_description: Proactively request any available documentation or contact points from the development team lead; allocate contingency time in the schedule for potential troubleshooting.

risk_register.description: Delay in obtaining necessary database connectivity or support due to the DBA team's backlog.
Deployment activities are delayed or cause disruption because coordination for deployment outside core business hours fails.
End-user acceptance testing is delayed or ineffective due to lack of engagement or availability of the End-User Representative.
